other_tests.procedure_name: Systemic and pulmonary artery pressure recordings
other_tests.findings: Extreme blood pressure oscillations with reciprocal changes in heart rate.
Successful removal of bilateral pheochromocytoma (left tumor size: 6.8 cm; right side: three tumors measuring 2.2 cm, 0.9 cm, and 0.8 cm).

other_tests.procedure_name: Total thyroidectomy with lymph node dissection

other_tests.findings: Elevated plasma norepinephrine (13,100 pg/mL) and epinephrine (350 pg/mL).
